alert.note: Alert for Jones; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 7:18PM MDT until May 27 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jones County in central South Dakota... Southwestern Stanley County in central South Dakota... * Until 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/. * At 818 PM CDT/718 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midland, or 23 miles east of Philip, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Capa around 830 PM CDT. Bunker around 730 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Van Metre. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
